post.text: The American people deserve better. The DNC and Hillary Rotten Clinton rigged the system and completely ignored what the people wanted! They are so, SO corrupt!

comment.author: Nathaniel
comment.text: Corrupt, Criminal Hillary Clinton should have been indicted! How many reasons do they need?- Perjury, Benghazi, Classified Emails, Private Server, Racketeering, Clinton Foundation Charity Fraud, Election fraud... SHAMEFUL!! #NeverHillary #HillaryForPrison2016

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: If you are against TPP vote Trump, otherwise just #neverhillary
